polish 6 danish 8 norwegian 9 the rust & rhythm bandana is a playful triangular scarf which combines a 4 x 2 garter stitch rib with the intarsia technique to create bold and graphical shapes the pattern includes step-by-step instructions for the intarsia join as well as detailed written instructions on how to increase and decrease within the garter stitch rib pattern this bandana is a fun way to play with colour combinations and colour placement as well as exploring the intarsia technique further the combination of intarsia and the garter stitch rib pattern adds interesting texture to the
